term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - natural broadening of a spectral line
term.title: natural broadening

item.text: Broadening which has its origin in the finite optical lifetime of one or both levels involved in the transition.

sources.item: PAC, 1985, 57, 1453. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis - V: Radiation sources (Recommendations 1985)' on page 1463 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198557101453)
